mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.u_id, r.name, r.sex, r.birthday, r.phone, r.grade, r.province, r.city, r.email, r.spare_time, r.introduce, r.title, r.job_type, r.salary, s.id as "major.school.id", s.school as "major.school.school", m.id as "major.id", m.major as "major.major" FROM tb_resume r, tb_school s, tb_major m where r.major=m.id and m.s_id=s.id and u_id=#{u_id}
